EmailTemplate.name: IAM USER NAME(S) CREATED
EmailTemplate.subject: IAM USER NAME(S) CREATED
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Your usernames have now been created in Quickserve. Please read the below before activating.
The email link is only active for 24 hrs only. If you do not activate within this time you will need to request a reset from 1300cummins@cummins.com
Users will be required to set up Challenge Question & Answers & their Password. If password is forgotten, you can click on "Forgot Password".
If you do not see the email in your inbox. Please also check junk/spam for a "NoReply" email from Quickserve.
